title: I need a program to take an isbn number off an excel spreadsheet find a price ona specific web site and then put that price on the spreadsheet.
snippet:
I need a program to take an isbn number off an excel spreadsheet find a price on a specific web site and then put that price on the spreadsheet.

This is the first step in a long term project that will involve taking info from up to 12 web sites and placing it on the spreadsheet.

This individual must be and expert at both excel and screen scraping programs  (Python, etc)
